Key Match Events: Tommy Pham hit his first home run for Kansas City, a tiebreaking, three-run drive in a four-run fourth inning, and the Royals stopped a season-high, seven-game losing streak with a 4-1 win over the Cleveland Guardians on Wednesday night.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Royals stopped a season-high, seven-game losing streak with a 4-1 win over the Cleveland Guardians.
Tommy Pham hit his first home run for Kansas City.
The game was played at Kauffman Stadium in Kansas City, Missouri, with an attendance of 14,094.
